lines.text: create integers a , b , c , d
read a read b read c read d
if a is greater than b , swap values of a and b
lines.code: if ( a > b ) swap ( a , b ) ;

lines.text: if b is greater than c , swap values of b and c
lines.code: if ( b > c ) swap ( b , c ) ;

lines.text: if c is greater than d , swap values of c and d
lines.code: if ( c > d ) swap ( c , d ) ;

lines.text: if a is greater than b , swap values of a and b
lines.code: if ( a > b ) swap ( a , b ) ;

lines.text: if b is greater than c , swap values of b and c
lines.code: if ( b > c ) swap ( b , c ) ;

lines.text: if a is greater than b , swap values of a and b
lines.code: if ( a > b ) swap ( a , b ) ;

lines.text: if c is greater than a + b and d is greater than b + c
lines.code: if ( c > a + b && d > b + c )

lines.text: else if c is less than a + b or d is less than b + c
lines.code: else if ( c < a + b || d < b + c )
